thread.title: Judge to rule on bid to dismiss case against Missouri governor

title: Judge to rule on bid to dismiss case against Missouri governor
text:
Judge to rule on bid to dismiss case against Missouri governor 2:41pm BST - 01:37 
A St. Louis judge is expected to rule on Thursday on a request by Missouri Governor Eric Greitens' lawyers to dismiss a criminal invasion of privacy case brought against the Republican politician in connection with an admitted extramarital affair. Linda So reports
